citations.desc: ACCESS AND INSPECTION OF RECORDS AND PROPERTY; SUBMISSION OF ITINERARIES.
citations.narrative:
A responsible adult was not available to accompany APHIS Officials during the inspection process at 1415 on
25-OCT-16.
Arrived at 1415; knocked on all doors; called licensee. Licensee informed me by phone that no facility
representatives available today.

narrative:
